title: My Pixel 3 XL won't turn on after restart or power off even it has 100% battery charge.
content: My Pixel phone won't restart or if it is powered off then I cannot turn on by pressing simply power on button. The only way i am able to turn on is to connect the power cable and when it flashes the battery percentage on the screen; only then clicking power button turns on the phone.  Please help.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
